code: import axios from"axios";var instance=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:3020/"});export var AppleAPI={getApple:function getApple(){return instance.get("apple/").then(function(response){return response.data;});},getOneApple:function getOneApple(id){return instance.get("apple/"+id).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var XiaomiAPI={getXiaomi:function getXiaomi(){return instance.get("xiaomi").then(function(response){return response.data;});},getOneXiaomi:function getOneXiaomi(id){return instance.get("xiaomi/"+id).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var DescriptionAPI={getDescription:function getDescription(){return instance.get("description").then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var BasketAPI={getBasket:function getBasket(){return instance.get("basket").then(function(response){return response.data;});},addInBasket:function addInBasket(name,photo,price,id){return instance.post("basket",{name:name,photo:photo,price:price,count:1,productId:id}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},deleteInBasket:function deleteInBasket(id){return instance.delete("basket/"+id).then(function(response){return response.data;});},countBasket:function countBasket(id,count){return instance.patch("basket/"+id,{count:count}).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var FeedBackAPI={getFeedBack:function getFeedBack(){return instance.get("feedBack").then(function(response){return response.data;});},addFeedBack:function addFeedBack(name,id,feedBack,rating,date){return instance.post("feedback",{name:name,productId:id,feedBack:feedBack,rating:rating,date:date});}};
